title: Temple Run 2
description: The web version of the popular endless runner game where you escape from temple guardians through ancient ruins. Run, jump, slide and turn through challenging terrain while collecting coins and power-ups. Features beautiful 3D environments and increasingly difficult obstacles.
how_to_play: Swipe left or right to turn, swipe up to jump, and swipe down to slide. On desktop, use arrow keys: left/right to turn, up to jump, down to slide. Tilt your device (or use A/D keys) to move side to side for collecting coins. Avoid obstacles and run as far as possible!
